name: Vivo-expert-finder
body:
### A Work in Progress
The VIVO Expert Finder has a long term goal to create an application which can use VIVO data to explore the expertise of scholars.  

Here's a 
[blog post](http://mconlon17.github.io/blog/an-expert-finder-for-vivo.html) on
[Some VIVO Things](http://mconlon17.github.io/), describing aspirations 
for the work.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
